sql-reference.content:
# SQL Reference

Syntax reference for SQL

## Creating Tables

```sql
CREATE TABLE database_name(
   column1 datatype  PRIMARY KEY,
   column2 datatype,
   column3 datatype,
   .....
   columnN datatype,
);
```

Example:

```sql
CREATE TABLE COMPANY(
   ID INT PRIMARY KEY     NOT NULL,
   NAME           TEXT    NOT NULL,
   AGE            INT     NOT NULL,
   ADDRESS        CHAR(50),
   SALARY         REAL
);
```
